## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r, echo=TRUE}

## load libraries
library("plyr")
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library("lubridate")
library("knitr")

## download data to working directory
download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip","ProjectOne")

## unzip data
unzip("ProjectOne")

## read in file including headers
activity<-read.csv("activity.csv",header=TRUE)

## convert dates to useful format
activity$date<-ymd(activity$date)
```
